LanguageData.VFEE_Apparel_TechfriarCrown.label: корона техножреця
LanguageData.VFEE_Apparel_TechfriarCrown.description: An exceedingly complex facemask fitted with advanced technology that is only known to high-ranking Sophian techpriests. Designed to be worn by designated researchers so that they can advance the empire’s needs without rest.\n\nThe inlaid techprint will synchronize and stimulate the wearer’s brain when they are performing research, effectively doubling research speed as well as restoring their needs for rest and recreation.
LanguageData.VFEE_Apparel_AbsolverHelmet.label: оптико-маскувальний шолом скорпіона
LanguageData.VFEE_Apparel_AbsolverHelmet.description: A high-tech helmet with a solid plasteel-weave shell and multi-spectrum sensors, which both feed telemetry data to the user and exterior shell. While it provides excellent protection, its primary purpose is to hide the user by using an intricate optical camouflage system while feeding firing solutions using real-time strategic information. Armor like this is only available to the Sophian Empire’s elite assassins due to limited production.
LanguageData.VFEE_Apparel_DeserterHelmet.label: шолом дезертира
LanguageData.VFEE_Apparel_DeserterHelmet.description: A heavily-armored high-tech helmet, with a solid plasteel-weave shell and indirect visual system for non-frontal view angles. It protects against all but the most powerful or luckily-aimed shots.\n\nOriginally a standard cataphract helmet, this has been modified to include a gunlink at the cost of removing the faceplate, sacrificing defense to improve offensive capabilities.
LanguageData.VFEE_Apparel_JanissaryHelmet.label: шолом яничара
LanguageData.VFEE_Apparel_JanissaryHelmet.description: A high-tech armored helmet with a built-in status computer and a protective plasteel-weave plate.\n\nIncludes a plasteel-plated gas mask that offers full protection against gas-related attacks, such as toxic environments.
